𓅭 GEN/SIS : Gän/son 𓅬 sin@Persian χήν  
𓅭𓇳 GynSon "son of the Sun" 𓅬

𓎛𓅭 1. dough 2. Docht [𓎛](𓎛) (wick) 3. 𓅭 duck  4. 𓅭𓏏 daugher
